description:
Miss Ayumi is a teacher at Graviton High School who has http://anidb.net/ch19892 [A-ko], http://anidb.net/ch19893 [B-ko], and http://anidb.net/ch19896 [C-ko] in her class at the same time. This means that she has the task of trying to get C-ko to learn while preventing A-ko and B-ko from murdering each other.
Note: Miss Ayumi is modeled after the lead character of the eponymous TV series http://anidb.net/a521 [Creamy Mami], one of several magical girl TV shows that came out during the 80s.
name: Ayumi-sensei
